shortDescription: Add some conditions, actions and expressions to check for the existence of a variable, delete existing ones from memory, and create dynamic variables.
name: ExtendedVariables
description:
This extension provides: 
- Conditions to check if a global/scene/object variable exists.
- Actions to delete an existing global/scene variable from memory.
- Actions for create a global/scene variable with a text input instead a variable input.
- Expressions for get the value or text from a global/scene variable with a text input instead a variable input.

Text input instead of variable input allow the user to use or create dynamics variable with expressions like: 
`"MyVar"+ ToString(Variable(Health))`
